alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Henderson; Madison; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 12:41PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Crockett, southeastern Weakley, northwestern Henderson, eastern Gibson, Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trenton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Humboldt, Milan, Lexington, McKenzie, Trenton, Huntingdon, Fairview, Greenfield, Three Way, Bradford, Atwood, Vale, Bargerton, Wildersville, Parkers Crossroads, Medina, Trezevant, Hollow Rock, Gadsden and Gibson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Henderson; Madison; Weakley
